Articles.Content:
Hi, I've been seeing this weird glitchy texture on the large 2.5m monoprop tank (forgot what it's called) ever since 1.4 dropped.

(BTW, I used xbox to take screenshots as F1 brings up the help menu on my laptop)

The only mod I have installed that I think could be messing with the textures is Firespitter (as a dependency for texture switching in another mod)

Anyone else had this? Or is there a fix?
